body_html:
I think I found the Issue. When i run the command exec env - I am disconnected from the server. This might be some security feature installed on the server I guess?
When I manully repeat the commands from the debug output, without the exec command it works fine...

body: I think I found the Issue. When i run the command exec env - I am disconnected from the server. This might be some security feature installed on the server I guess? When I manully repeat the commands from the debug output, without the exec command it works fine...
